SELECT b.std_name, b.id_card, b.mobile, a.grade, a.recruit_type, a.std_stage, a.scholarship, d.unvs_name, e.pfsn_name, e.pfsn_code, c.pfsn_level, g.emp_name, h.campus_name, j.fee_amount, j.payable, k.send_id, k.logistics_no, k.logistics_name, k.receive_status, j.sub_order_status, k.order_book_status, date_format(k.`send_date`,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') send_date FROM bd_learn_info a LEFT JOIN bd_student_info b ON a.std_id = b.std_id LEFT JOIN bd_student_enroll c ON a.learn_id = c.learn_id LEFT JOIN bd_university d ON c.unvs_id = d.unvs_id LEFT JOIN bd_unvs_profession e ON e.pfsn_id = c.pfsn_id LEFT JOIN bd_learn_rules f ON f.learn_id = a.learn_id LEFT JOIN oa_employee g ON g.emp_id = f.recruit LEFT JOIN oa_campus h ON h.campus_id = f.recruit_campus_id LEFT JOIN bd_student_order i ON i.learn_id = a.learn_id LEFT JOIN bd_sub_order j ON j.order_no = i.order_no LEFT JOIN (select * from bd_student_send where textbook_type='FD') k ON a.learn_id = k.learn_id WHERE a.recruit_type = '1' AND j.item_code = 'Y0'
AND b.std_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{query.stdName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , '%')
AND b.id_card LIKE CONCAT('%',#{query.idCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
AND a.grade = #{query.grade,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND d.unvs_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{query.idCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
AND d.unvs_id = #{query.unvsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND c.pfsn_level LIKE CONCAT('%',#{query.pfsnLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
AND e.pfsn_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{query.pfsnName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
AND a.scholarship = #{query.scholarship,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and (k.order_book_status is null or k.order_book_status in(1,2))
and k.order_book_status = 3
AND k.logistics_no LIKE CONCAT('%',#{query.logisticsNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
AND b.mobile LIKE CONCAT('%',#{query.mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
AND f.recruit = #{user.empId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
ORDER BY a.grade DESC,b.`create_time` DESC
SELECT b.`textbook_id` textbookId, b.`textbook_name` textbookName FROM bd_textbook_send s LEFT JOIN bd_textbook b ON b.`textbook_id` = s.`textbook_id` WHERE s.`send_id` = #{sendId}
